```java
apiVersion: serving.knative.dev/v1
kind: Service ![1](Images/1.png)
metadata:
 name: inventory-svc
spec:
 template:
   spec:
     containers:
       - image: docker.io/modernizingjavaappsbook/inventory-quarkus:latest ![2](Images/2.png)
         ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
```

```java
apiVersion: eventing.knative.dev/v1
kind: Broker
metadata:
 name: default
 namespace: coolstore
```

```java
 kubectl create -f kubernetes/kbroker.yaml
```

```java
NAME     URL   AGE  READY  REASON
default  http://broker-ingress.knative-eventing...coolstore/default ↳
 11s  True
```

```java
apiVersion: eventing.knative.dev/v1
kind: Trigger
metadata:
  name: inventory-trigger
spec:
  broker: default ![1](Images/1.png)
  filter:
    attributes:
      type: web-wakeup ![2](Images/2.png)
  subscriber:
    ref:
     apiVersion: serving.knative.dev/v1 ![3](Images/3.png)
     kind: Service
     name: inventory
```

```java
 kubectl create -f kubernetes/ktrigger.yaml
```

```java
NAME               BROKER   SUBSCRIBER_URI  AGE  READY  REASON
inventory-trigger  default  http://inventory.coolstore...local/  10s  True
```

```java
kubectl run curl --image=radial/busyboxplus:curl -ti --↳

  -H "Ce-Id: wakeup" \
  -H "Ce-Specversion: 1.0" \
  -H "Ce-Type: web-wakeup" \ ![1](Images/1.png)
  -H "Ce-Source: web-coolstore" \ ![2](Images/2.png)
  -H "Content-Type: application/json"
  -d ""
```
